6 Clean the vulva from above downwards with one gloved hand (not the examining hand) by using 
swab.
Examining the vagina –Examining the cervix and deciding the stage of labour
1 Use the thumb and forefinger of the left hand to part the labia majora, so that the vaginal opening is 
clearly visible. Gently insert the index and middle finger of examining hand into vagina.
2 Keep other hand o
